ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from entering a Product Start Date value more than 60 days previous to the current date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c, 'INTERNAL REFERRALS'), Product_Start_Date__c < TODAY() - 120, $Profile.Name <>"System Administratorrrrrrr" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter a Product Start Date value older than 120 days ago.
